data.title: Board of Directors
data.text:
The new board members of the Federation of Quebec Alzheimer Societies were elected during the extraordinary annual general assembly of the Federation on June 22,2022.

Executive board

President: Luc Pinard, retired- Groupe CGI

Vice-President: Charles Cyr-Gill, Senior Change Management/Organizational Development Consultant

Treasurer: Marieve Heroux, Senior manager CPA, CA, Deloitte Canada

Secretary: Valérie Champagne - Chief Financial Officer / VP Finance and Administration of G2MC Inc.

Board Members

Jean-Denis Allaire- Retired from the Health and Social Services network

Jacques Gravel - Retired

Marie-Héléne Lajoie - General manager

Diane Lancette: Retired

Pascal Langlois - Regional advisor Côte-Nord for la Fédération des travailleurs et travailleuses du Québec (FTQ; Quebec Federation of Labour)

Shlomi Steve Levy - Lawyer

Anick Redburn - Senior Business Advisor, Consulting MXO

Julie Rochette - Lawyer
